title: Hour 1 - Marc Stein (07-27-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Marc Stein (07-27-20)
description:
Jamal Adams criticized his way out of the New York Jets--a franchise in turmoil with owner Woody Johnson's past remarks under scrutiny and head coach Adam Gase unable to lead effectively. In the larger scope of New York professional sports, Dan concludes the whole scene to be overrated. Also, The New York Times' Marc Stein joins this hour to discuss the NBA bubble's comings and goings.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
